section.heading: Requirement for deed before action against current occupant of foreclosed property.

para.text: No purchaser from a foreclosure auction or other auction shall issue a notice to quit or otherwise initiate an action for possession, ejectment, or their equivalents, or charge rent, fair use and occupancy, or their equivalents, against a current occupant unless a deed transfers the property to the purchaser and the deed is recorded at the Recorder of Deeds.
This section does not alter the rights of tenants whose tenancies survive foreclosure.
